tooltip: Select Sulkaris, the Fallen Sage as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Sulkaris focuses on improving the durability of Gohma units.
Allows you to summon Sulkaris, a massive creature hero that tears apart enemies with her claws.
Access to a large self destruct unit and tough infantry knight.
Access to a tower upgrade that that increases its power and a farmstead.
Dramatically improves Magic armor, slightly improves non-magic armor, and passively damages melee attackers for Soldier Larva, Pincergohma, Spinalgohma and Shieldgohma.
